course.title: MAT 3166 Introduction to Number Theory (3 units)
course.desc: Topics chosen from: Farey sequence, Fermat-Euler-Wilson theorems, power residues and primitive roots, Diophantine equations, continued fractions, algebraic and transcendental numbers, arithmetic functions, distribution of primes.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: MAT 2143 or MAT 2348.
